ygData.subject: Re: Ice Crystal staff and Quest?
ygData.msgSnippet: IIRC, the preacher has either a Cold Iron Mace? (name something like that) or the Runed Circlet. I would think someone else had it. There is a Wizard quest
ygData.messageBody:
IIRC, the preacher has either a Cold Iron Mace? (name
something like that) or the Runed Circlet. I would
think someone else had it.

There is a Wizard quest dealing with the Ice Comet
spell that requires various staffs, I believe that is
what these are for. From the information I have, you
need to be a Wizard to do it because of research
requirements.

Belgarth.

--- Reuben Aguilar <reuben@...> wrote:
> From: "Reuben Aguilar" <reuben@...>
>
> Hi there,
>
> Im in permafrost and I have been hunting for the mob
> that has the Ice
> Crystal Staff. I was under the impression that it
> was the Preacher that had
> it. But I can't seem to get it.. Anyone know if it
> is the preacher or is it
> in another area ?
>
> Also, I read on everlore that the staffs are part of
> a quest. Somehow you
> can use the Water Crystal Staff and starts a long
> quest to get a great mage
> useable one handed magic staff or something... Im
> curious if any of you have
> any idea as to what it is ?
>
> Thanks
>
> Reuben
